author: Simon Difford
description: Sake adds some oriental intrigue to what would otherwise be a plain old grape cocktail.
name: Oriental Grape Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
